content: *this warm scarf s pattern is similar to winter thermals lion brand yarn * skill level easy + wool-ease® article #620 2 balls crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm *optional crochet hook - size i-9 to finish final row of scarf * special stitch fpdc front post double_crochet worked in 2-row waffle pattern to desired length available under different names and in different colorways 80986ad waffle stitch crochet scarf 1 2009 620-138 wool-ease yarn cranberry 90198ad thermal scarf 2 2009 620-151 wool-ease yarn grey heather 1 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/80986ad html 2 http //www lionbrand com/patterns/90198ad html
